overview: Living Gifts is India’s largest online nursery and online gift company. Living Gifts has maintained its commitment to quality, integrity and service. We take pride in sending plants as “Gift A Plant” program over 100 cities in India and serving residential and commercial plants needs, delivering flowers, cakes, chocolates and many other unique gifts in India. Living Gifts´ dedicated staffs at all levels of Gifting Experience have built a reputation for attention to detail, customer satisfaction and flexible scheduling. We are the trusted partner for India’s leading companies for their customer delight program. SHOP NOW !
